fields.name: Piercing Fragments (C1)
fields.value: When a Normal Attack hits, it deals AoE DMG.

fields.name: Shock Effect (C2)
fields.value:
When Jade Screen is shattered, its CD will reset.
Can occur once every 6s.

fields.name: Majesty be the Array of Stars (C3)
fields.value:
Increases the Level of Starshatter by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Exquisite be the Jade, Outshining All the Beneath (C4)
fields.value: Jade Screen increases nearby characters' Elemental RES by 10%.

fields.name: Invincible be the Jade Screen (C5)
fields.value:
Increase the Level of Jade Screen by 3.
Maximum upgrade level is 15.

fields.name: Grandeur be the Seven Stars (C6)
fields.value: When Starshatter is used, Ningguang gains 7 Star Jades.
